function.name: create_project
function.description: Create a new project with the specified name.

projectName.description: The name of the project to be created.

function.name: navigate_page
function.description: Navigate to a specific page using the provided location URL.

location.description: The URL or path of the page to navigate to.

function.name: add_sprite
function.description: Add a new sprite to the project from the specified library.

libraryName.description: The name of the library containing the sprite.

spriteName.description: The name of the sprite to be added after selection.

function.name: insert_code
function.description: Insert or replace code at a specific location in the file.

code.description: The code to be inserted or replaced.

insertRange.description: The range where the code will be inserted.

startLine.description: The starting line number for the insertion.

endLine.description: The ending line number for the insertion.

replaceRange.description: The range of code to be replaced.

startLine.description: The starting line number of the code to replace.

endLine.description: The ending line number of the code to replace.
